segmentrr 0.0.0.900
  • Reference

segmentrr

‘Rcpp’ Port of TinySegmenter

System Requirements

  • GNU make
  • GNU GCC
  • Go
  • C++11

Usage

# remotes::install_github("paithiov909/segmentrr")
print(escaped)
#> [1] "耳をすませば"   "聞こえてくるよ" "君のとなり"     "目と鼻の先"
segmentrr::segment(escaped)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] "耳"       "を"       "すませば"
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] "聞こえ" "て"     "くるよ"
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] "君"   "の"   "と"   "なり"
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] "目"   "と"   "鼻"   "の先"
